requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
こんにちは。

Twitterから来ました、あなたの作品が本当に好きです。TSFで人狼・狼のトランスファー絵に興味があります。

私のキャラクター（男性ですが、女の子のように見えます）が欲しいです。
https://i.imgur.com/UfJyIow.png
https://i.imgur.com/LKXkzKW.png
このような服を着ている（自由にアレンジ、変更可能、靴とズボンが主です）。
https://i.imgur.com/BbSfjeI.jpg
このような、大きな女性の狼・人狼の姿に変身する。
https://i.imgur.com/7aLvXDP.jpg

尻尾の変形と肉球の変形はこんな感じにして欲しいです。
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FU9BPlnVEAESKAc?format=jpg&name=large

しっぽと肉球が服からはみ出るのがとても好きです。もし描いていただけるなら、ここ（真ん中）みたいに、ちょっと催眠状態とか、ボーッとしている感じも欲しいです。
https://i.pximg.net/img-original/img/2022/04/24/15/28/56/97845473_p4.jpg

TSFはこんな感じでいいと思います。
https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/98975968

以上です!ありがとうございました。

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
Hello!

I come from Twitter, I really like your work. I would be interested in a werewolf/wolf transfur picture with TSF.

I want my character (he is male, but looks like a girl):
https://i.imgur.com/UfJyIow.png
https://i.imgur.com/LKXkzKW.png
He is wearing clothing similar to this one (you can freely adapt or change it, it's mostly for shoes and pants):
https://i.imgur.com/BbSfjeI.jpg
Transforming into his big female wolf/werewolf form, like this:
https://i.imgur.com/7aLvXDP.jpg

I want tail transform and paw shoe transform to look like this:
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FU9BPlnVEAESKAc?format=jpg&name=large

I really really love when the tail and the paw burst through clothing. If you draw it, I would really like a bit of hypnosis or daze, like on here (in the middle):
https://i.pximg.net/img-original/img/2022/04/24/15/28/56/97845473_p4.jpg

The TSF can look similar to this:
https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/98975968

I think it's all! Thank you very much!!

en.planDescriptionHtml:
The basic price is 13,000 yen. We will adjust the amount of drawing according to the increase or decrease of your budget!
Example) For one person...
With 1000 yen, you will get a minimum of graffiti.
For 20,000 yen, a background will be included.
Please describe your particular points in as much detail as possible.

If there is no indication that you would like us to make the image available only to the public, we will make it available to the public as a whole.

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
Hi there, thanks for taking requests!
I was hoping to request a POV picture of Springfield's bare feet from Girls' Frontline, in a view/pose similar to this previous work of yours: https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/97818345. She would be wearing her default dress, and would be looking at the viewer with a smiling expression similar to her reference, maybe with slightly more blushing. If possible, could you include a variation where she's wearing silk stockings? She would be sitting in an office chair, with her removed boots (with her slightly sweaty stockings hanging out of them if you want to include) on the floor, next to the chair. Thanks much for your consideration, and take care!

Springfield reference sheet:
https://gelbooru.com/index.php?page=post&s=view&id=3650304

en.planDescriptionHtml:
I am willing to accept most of them, except for those that are completely R-18, grotesque, or lyona-oriented. However, due to time and ability, we prefer to receive drawings of individual characters.
Completed illustrations will be published on Pixiv.

For the time being, the limit is one piece a week at the earliest. I will do my best to draw quickly. I will give priority to the requests that come first, so I will accept the next request after I see the end of that work, so there may be a bit of a delay in accepting your request. Please understand.

*Request progress is currently delayed due to health issues. It's not a big deal, but I'm not tired and tend to fall asleep. ...... Please understand that I will finish as soon as possible.

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Dr. PUDDING
Hello, please excuse my abrupt message.

I have been a fan of your work for a long time, and I would like to make a request for you to create an image for me, and if you are willing, I would like you to create a wonderful work of art with your skill.
The picture I would like you to create is of Alice taking care of her friend in the hospital room. People may feel a lot of loneliness when they are sick. I was infected with corona the other day and I think I know exactly what these feelings are. If your Alice-chan was by your side even then, that would surely be the happiest thing for you.
Yes, first of all.
Size: Wallpaper for PC (16:10)
About the screen: In the viewpoint of the image is the situation in the room from left to right, (some part is the patient bed, mainly Alice-chan next to it). Alice-chan, whose expression is kind, is on the right side of the bed, sitting on a chair and shaving a pear peel. Outside the window, it is already twilight, and the glow of the setting sun is shining through, just as the knife shines with its light.
And there are two concert tickets left alone on the hospital room desk, like advance preparation.
Finally, I have a rather rude request. If you don't mind, I would like you to put my ID (Paysage) beside the doctor's signature. Also, if you publish it on Pixiv, a version without ID is also OK.
I wish you all the best with your creations.

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
pudding先生
こんにちは、突然のメッセージ失礼いたします。

ずっと前から先生の作品が気に入っていすまが、この度ぜひ画像制作の願いをさせていただき、よろしければ、先生の腕で素晴らしい作品を作って欲しいです。
今回頼んで欲しい絵は、病室で友人の面倒を見るアリスちゃんのことです。人は病気になっている時に寂しい感じがいっぱい出るかもしれませんね。この前、コロナに感染され、こういう気持ちがしっかり分かると思っています。もしその時も先生のアリスちゃんが傍にいれば、それはきっと一番幸せなことですね。
ええ、まず
サイズはパソコン用壁紙（16：10）
画面について：画像の視点には左から右まで部屋内の状況です、（一部の部分は患者ベッド、主に隣のアリスちゃん）。表情が優しいアリスちゃんはベッドの右側に、椅子に座りながら梨の皮を削っています。窓の外にはすでに黄昏の時になって、夕陽の輝きが差し込んで、ちょうどナイフがその光でピカピカになりました。
そして、病室の机の上にコンサートのチケット2枚が放っておいてあります、事前準備みたいな感じです。
最後にはちょっと失礼な頼みがあります。もしよければ、先生のサイン以外、私のIDも（Paysage）傍に書き付けて欲しいのです。あと、先生はPixivの方に公表したら、IDなしのバージョンもオーケーです。
ご創作、これからも順調にありますように、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします。

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
I would like to ask you to create a comic strip.
The content is about a raccoon dog returning the favor. Meisho Dotou leaves food in front of a sleeping raccoon dog early in the morning and heads for the school. However, when he arrives at the school, Dotou notices that he has forgotten some things (textbooks, etc.) and becomes impatient. Machikanefukukkitaru (who is actually a raccoon dog) delivers the forgotten items, says a few words of thanks to Dotou (such as "Thank you for everything"), and leaves.
Dotou finishes class without understanding what happened, and meets Machikanefukukkitar (the real one) again to thank him, but Machikanefukkitar does not seem to understand...
When I returned to my room, the raccoon dog was still sleeping, not moving from his morning state. I covered him with a blanket and noticed something. A leaf had fallen into the empty food bowl. Finally, Dotou does something to the raccoon dog (hugging, petting, etc... I can't think of a good way to describe it) and that's it.
Sorry for the long sentence. I would like to see it if possible. I need some healing!

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
マンガの作成をお願いしたいです。
内容はタヌキの恩返しです。メイショウドトウは早朝眠っているタヌキの前に餌を置き、学園へ向かいます。しかし、学園に着いてから忘れ物(教科書など)に気付いたドトウは焦ります。そこへマチカネフクキタル(正体はタヌキ)が忘れ物を届けてくれてドトウへ一言お礼(いつもありがとう等)を伝えその場を去ります。
ドトウはよくわからないまま授業を終え、改めてマチカネフクキタル(本物)に会いお礼を伝えますがマチカネフクキタルはよく分からない様子…
今日の出来事がよく分からないまま自室まで戻るとタヌキは朝の状態から動かずそのまま寝ていました。毛布だけ掛けてあげるとある事に気付きます。それは空になった餌の器の中に葉っぱが1枚落ちていた事です。最後にドトウがタヌキへ何か(抱きつくや撫でるなど…いいのが思いつきません)をして終わりという感じです。
長文で申し訳ありません。可能であれば見てみたいです。癒やしが欲しい！

I draw illustrations/manga.

I will use my own judgment in the creation of my works, unless otherwise specified. I will use my own judgment in the creation of my works (picture design, color/black and white, etc.).

I want an illustration of a cute girl.

I will start with her hair. I want a hairstyle like this : https://i.pinimg.com/originals/5e/a2/35/5ea2358133376f2584c248848b42a93c.jpg

You can choose the hair color as you like.

Clothes should be like a high school summer uniform, cellar clothes. The skirt length is just above the knee.

Her body is like a JK's. She has a little bit of breast but not too big. Height is a little on the short side.

The background is like a high school classroom.

Character is sitting directly on the floor at a desk or under a table (just in case you can't see her panties). The character is probably a little shy.

And I want to use it for a novel I'm writing as a hobby on an English novel site (probably similar to pixiv novels, kakuyom, etc. etc.). If you don't want it, you don't have to accept the request, of course.

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
かわいい女の子のイラストがほしいです。

髪型から始めます。このような髪型が欲しい:　https://i.pinimg.com/originals/5e/a2/35/5ea2358133376f2584c248848b42a93c.jpg

髪色はくらい方の色を好きに選んでいい。

服は、高校の夏制服の感じのがいいです、セラー服の。スカートの丈ガ膝のちょうど上。

体がJKな感じ。胸ガ少しあるけどでかくも決してない。身長ガ少し短い方。

背景ガ高校の教室の感じの。

キャラの体制ガ、デスクあるいはテーブルの下で床に直接座ってる(念の為に言っておきますが、パンツガ見えないポジションで)。キャラは多分少しシャイな性格をしてる。

そして、英語小説サイト(多分pixiv小説、カクヨムなどなどと似てる感じのサイトです)で趣味として書いてる小説のために使いたいです。それを欲しくなければ、もちろんリクエストを受けなくても大丈夫です。

こんにちは、niyori先生はとてもクオリティの高いデザインをされるようなので、クオリティの高いキャラクターデザインをお願いしたいです。

キャラクターのイメージはこんな感じです。
-美少女
-ファンタジーの暗殺者（西洋風）
-二刀流、剣術が非常に得意（基本的に無双状態）
-ちょっとダークな感じ
-少し威圧的な感じ
-カッコイイ
-かわいい
-長い銀髪
-少し鋭い目

3面デザイン画像とシナリオ画像でハイディテールの高品質デザインを作成する気がない方はご遠慮ください。
ありがとうございました。

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
Hello. I love your artwork with girls wearing white tights, such as https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/97899948. Can I request something of similar style and quality to this?

Could you draw my flat-chested loli character named Nut-chan. She is a cat girl kemonomimi with cat ears and a cat tail, with a shy personality. 

Character Reference: https://rebrand.ly/3332bf

Please draw her wearing a cute outfit of the artists design, with emphasis being on her semi-transparent white tights and thighs. Preferably in a training school environment similar to sensei's other recent works, where she takes on a more tactical supporting role. 

My main request however is for her to be drawn cutely!

Can you please provide me with a PSD file of this image for archival?

[Optional] If the scene would be enriched by a secondary character / background character, Nut-chan is usually associated with the Deer Girl Isis-chan (https://rebrand.ly/9f711e) or Tiger Girl Shu-chan (https://rebrand.ly/1a7688).

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
ajimita-sensei, I am always looking forward to seeing your wonderful illustrations!

This time, I would like to request an illustration of my favorite vtuber.
The illustration is of a vtuber, but it is only for fans to share and appreciate, and will not be used for commercial purposes or as a thumbnail for a live performance.

If possible, I would like to use the following themes
(1) Bend your back under the night sky and look at the sea.
(2) Standing on the surface of the sea and looking into the distance.
Please feel free to choose one of the following

The size of the picture should be horizontal, and at the risk of sounding impolite, would you be willing to give us a minimum of a half-length picture?
Also, I love the way you draw the eyes, so please emphasize the eyes as much as possible.
If possible, please use psd as the delivery format.
Please refer to the URL for the settings.
 https://drive.google.com/file/d/1LM04xw7kdb-bpr5OUCAfUMMNazBwJDaD/view?usp=sharing
Thank you very much for your consideration.
Thank you very much!

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Thank you for all your wonderful illustrations.
I would like to send you a request after a little while.

This time it was another person's request.
I would like to request this version by [Red Kunoichi] because the sleep illustration of Shine ( https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/100327056) was wonderful.
I would like to request this version by Red Kunoichi.
The situation is almost the same as the aforementioned illustration.

Red Kunoichi is being put to sleep by anesthetics such as chloroform.
He is lying on his back with a peaceful sleeping face. There is no damage to the suit.
The pose is slightly changed from the aforementioned illustration, with the face facing forward and the armpit showing in a pose as if using the arm as a pillow.
　⇒The image of the pose is similar to the left side of this illustration. https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/99414355
No helmet. If you could put a pink lip on her lips and make her face look like a glamorous sleeping face.

We would also appreciate an illustration of her in underwear with an image of untransforming, as an additional costume diff.
The design of the underwear should be a simple string underwear like the illustration below, white in color. (It does not have to be the exact same design.)
 https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/99421363

(It does not have to be the exact same design.) The lace and wrinkles should give the impression of underwear (without making it look like a bathing suit).
The bra is small and tight to match Red Knochi's big breasts.
And please add a hickey on the left breast that looks like it was put on by a female executive.
The image is as if she was captured and marked by a female executive...

I estimate 15,000 for the basic illustration + costume diff.
If this is not enough, I will add more, so I would appreciate it if you would consider it.
There should be no R-18 elements this time, so I request all ages!

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
いつも素晴らしいイラストありがとうございます。
少し久々にリクエストを送らせて頂きたいと思います。

今回は別の方のリクエストであった、
シャインの睡眠イラスト（https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/100327056）が素晴らしかったので、
こちらの【レッド・クノイチ】さんバージョンでお願いしたいと思います。
シチュエーションは前述のイラストとほぼ同様です。

・クロロホルムなどの麻酔薬を使われ、眠らされているレッド・クノイチ。
・仰向けに寝かされており、安らかな寝顔。スーツにダメージは無し。
・ポーズは前述のイラストから少し変えて、顔を正面向けに、腕を枕にしているようなポーズで腋を見せる。
　⇒ポーズのイメージはこちらのイラストの左側が近いです：https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/99414355
・ヘルメットは無し。唇にピンクのリップを差し、艶っぽい寝顔にして頂ければ。

また、追加のコスチューム差分で、変身解除をイメージして下着姿になっているイラストもお願い致します。
下着のデザインは下記イラストのようなシンプルな紐下着で色は白。（全く同じデザインである必要はありません）
https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/99421363

レースやシワの感じで下着感を出して頂ければと（水着っぽく見えないように）。
レッド・クノイチの巨乳に合わせて、ブラジャーは小さめかつキツめで。
そしてこちらの差分には、左胸に女性幹部に付けられたらしきキスマークを付けてください。
女性幹部に囚われ、マーキングされたようなイメージで…

見積もりは基本イラスト＋コスチューム差分で、15000で見積もっております。
不足でしたら追加しますのでご検討頂けると幸いです。
また今回はR-18要素はないはずですので全年齢でリクエスト致します！

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
ひろ☆先生、こんにちは。 前回のイラスト、素晴らしかったです！ 色使いやイラストの雰囲気がたまりませんので、またリクエストしたいと思います！ありがとうございました。

今回依頼したいキャラクターは、「千恋*万花」の鞍馬小春ちゃん
https://yande.re/post/show/368818
https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/92533202
キャラと服はこんな感じ

見たいシーンは、この服穿いて小春ちゃんは鏡に背を向けてひざまづく、片手にスマホを持って自撮り、パンツを履いていないので、もう片方の手や指で必死にお尻とあそこを隠している。どこかに脱いだパンツやサンダルが見える。 やや恥ずかしそうな表情で、「お兄ちゃんの変態......今回、あんなに必死に頼まれなければ、こんな写真撮らなかったのに......」というセリフを言っていた(実は淫語を書くのは苦手なのですが、ただ、こんな感じのセリフが欲しかったので、このセリフは好きなように付けてください)。
彼女はお尻と裸足裏を鏡に向け、鏡を見るために顔を向けるこの絵は「お尻と足が大好きなお兄ちゃんのために、小春ちゃんが一生懸命にサービス写真を撮っている」という感じなので、実際のイラストはこの自撮りです。

受けていただけたら幸いです。よろしくお願いします！

requestTranslationProposal.requestProposal:
Nice to meet you. I am the one who was very much stung by the Doberman & White Tigerization the other day.
I would like to request 3 more illustrations of this one.

 https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/99969593

One is of two magical girls who, as in the illustration, have been turned into beasts.
They regain their rationality through the power of their bond and transform into magical girls, but instead of being the original humans, their bodies go from four-legged beasts to bipedal beastmen based on human skeletons dressed as magical girls. We ask them to be surprised at each other's hairy and transformed appearance and to be troubled about what to do from now on.
The physical appearance of the beastmen when they are beastmen is larger than when they are human, with a feeling that shows that the magical girl's costume is tighter.
The blackened whites of her eyes in the original illustration should be white to indicate that she is rational.
If the tight-fitting costume is difficult, you can just put it on normally.

The other two illustrations are

 https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/95690803
As in the third of these illustrations.
Human
Beast
Beast
I would like you to draw a rough sketch of a standing picture of each of these characters.

Kasumi
 https://twitter.com/priconne_redive/status/1224168760371638272/photo/1
Shiori
 https://twitter.com/priconne_redive/status/1224168370917920768

If the above request is possible, please do so.

requestProposal.requestOriginalProposal:
はじめまして。先日のドーベルマン&白虎化がとても刺さった者です。
こちらのイラストの続きを3枚リクエストしたいです。

https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/99969593

1枚はイラストのように2人の魔法少女が獣になってしまった後、
絆の力で理性を取り戻し、魔法少女に変身するも元の人間ではなく、体が四つ脚の獣から魔法少女の格好をした人間の骨格ベースの2足歩行の獣人になる。お互いの毛むくじゃらに変わり果てた姿に驚き、これからどうしようと困っている様子をお願いします。
獣人時の肉体は人間のときよりも大きく魔法少女の衣装がキツくなっていることが分かる感じで、
元のイラストの黒くなった白目部分は理性があることを示すように白い白目でお願いします。
パツパツになった衣装は難しかったら普通に着せるだけでも良いです。

後の2枚のイラストは

https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/95690803
このイラストの3枚目のように
・人間
・獣
・獣人
の立ち絵のラフ画をそれぞれのキャラで描いてほしいです。

カスミ
https://twitter.com/priconne_redive/status/1224168760371638272/photo/1
シオリ
https://twitter.com/priconne_redive/status/1224168370917920768

以上のリクエストで可能でしたらお願いします。

en.planDescriptionHtml:
I draw full color transfur and meskemo!
The approximate price is for a single illustration (price for one character).
Both original and copyrighted works are acceptable (in the case of copyrighted works, please use only the tags "transfur" and "XX-ification").
(In the case of copyright, please only use the tags "transfur" and "xxxification".) Please feel free to request anything from a complete animal to a bipedal animal, pose, background, facial expression, etc. (We will try to match your request as much as possible).
The deadline for completion is usually 2 weeks to 1 month (progress will be written in my profile).

Please feel free to make a request! Best regards! _(┐No ε:)No

I will draw illustrations without differential data.
If you want to request the illustration with differential data, you can go my "skeb" page.
(My "skeb" URL is on the profile page.)

Please write your request in as much detail as possible.

Minor genres and characters with extremely few reference materials may be refused at my discretion.
Don't use translater please. Use your standard native language.

If the requested request quantity of work is determined to be difficult to achieve, it may be partially omitted.
 
Thank you!

planDescription.planOriginalDescription:
●アイコン（アップ）や、半身（腰から上）、膝上（膝から上）の立ち絵のリクエストを受付ています。

＜リクエスト内容＞
・頭身：通常頭身、デフォルメ（「ペチっと」で検索してみてください）
・カラー：カラー原稿
・キャラ数：1人
・背景：無し、もしくは単色、単純なパターン、グラデーション
・レイティング：一般／R-18も可能ですが、軽度なものに限らせていただきます
・クオリティ：「ワンドロ」くらいの描き込みになります。

＜絵柄（得意分野）＞
○性別：女の子＞男の子
○年齢：10～20代
○体型：細身でスレンダーなキャラクターが得意です。逆にグラマーなキャラは苦手です。

＜キャラの描写範囲：通常頭身用＞
○アップ：胸から上。胸部含む。
○半身：腰から上。
○膝上：太ももから上。

＜追加差分＞
＋表情差分…500円
＋衣装差分…5000円
＋衣装差分（色違い）…1000円
＋全裸差分…5000円（性器は描写しません。つるつるです。必要な場合は局部に絆創膏をお付けします）

＜ギフトファイル＞
完成イラストに文字入れをしたものがSNS上で公開されます。
リクエスト、相乗りして頂いた方には文字の入っていないものを送付します。

・局部に修正が必要なもの
乳首、股部を隠蔽処理したものがSNS上で公開されます。
リクエスト、相乗りして頂いた方には隠蔽処理のないものを送付します。

＜作業日数＞
作業日数は通常2週間の予定ですが、事情により前後する場合があります。

＜禁止している利用方法＞
○営利目的での利用。
○政治・宗教・暴力・詐欺・犯罪・アダルトサイト・出会い系等公序良俗に反するコンテンツ、又は媒体。
○当イラストのイメージを著しく損なう利用方法や、当方に不快感・不利益が生じる様な当方が不適切と判断したコンテンツ。
○自作発言、配布。
○加工（但し、カット、縮小、透過した背景部分の背景差し替えは行って頂いて構いません）。
○リクエストイラストを用いて作成したグッズ等の販売（個人で楽しんでいただく分には問題ありません）。


＜プラン修正：201007＞
・目安の金額と作品クオリティを下げ気軽にリクエストいただけるように修正しました。
クオリティの高いしっかりした物はSKIMA（https://skima.jp/profile?id=77134）よりご依頼ください。

en.planDescriptionHtml:
We accept requests for icons (close-up), half-body (from the waist up), and knee-high (from the knees up) standing pictures.

＜Request details
Head and body: Normal head and body, deformed (please search "Petite")
Color: Color manuscript
Number of characters: 1
Background: No background, or single color, simple pattern, gradation
Rating: General / R-18 is possible, but only mild.
Quality: The drawing should be about the same as "Wondoro".

＜Gender: Girls > Boys
Gender: Girls > Boys
Age: 10 to 20s
Body shape: I'm good at slim and slender characters. On the other hand, I'm not good at glamorous characters.

＜Character's range of description: For normal head.
Close-up: Chest to top. Including the chest.
Half body: From the waist up.
Above the knee: From the thigh up.

＜Additional difference
＋Expression difference ... 500 yen
+Clothing difference ... 5000 yen
+Clothing difference (different color) ... 1000 yen
+Naked difference ... 5000 yen (Genitals are not depicted.) It is smooth. (If necessary, I will attach a bandage to the local area.

＜Gift File
The completed illustration with text will be published on SNS.
We will send a gift file with no text to those who request or carpool with us.

The one that needs to be corrected in the local area
The nipples and crotch will be covered up and published on SNS.
We will send the one without the cover-up to the person who requested or shared with us.

＜Working days
Usually 2 weeks, but it may be longer or shorter depending on the situation.

＜Prohibited usage
Use for commercial purposes.
If you have any questions, please contact us.
Any content that we deem inappropriate, such as use in a way that significantly damages the image of our illustrations, or content that causes discomfort or disadvantage to us.
Self-made remarks and distribution.
Processing (However, you may cut, reduce, and replace the transparent background).
Selling goods made from the requested illustrations (there is no problem if you enjoy them privately).


＜(Plan revision: 201007)
We have modified the plan so that you can feel free to request us by lowering the standard amount and quality of the work.
Please contact SKIMA (https://skima.jp/profile?id=77134) for high quality and solid work.
